problem.p: The rectifier converts AC voltage to pure DC voltage
In a half wave rectifier with capacitor filter the diode conducts continuously during alternate cycles
Bridge rectifier is a very effective rectifier as it improves ripple factor on account of four rectifier diodes used in the circuit
Since the diode/s in rectifiers with filter capacitor conduct current pulses, the output voltage too is in the form of pulses.
The rectifiers use transformer to transform AC to DC
